title: Jagame Thandhiram
description: When a clever, carefree gangster is recruited to help an overseas crime lord take down a rival, he is caught off guard by the moral dilemmas that follow.

title: The Irregulars
description: A crew of misfits investigates a series of supernatural crimes in Victorian London for Dr. Watson and his shadowy associate, Sherlock Holmes.

title: Thunder Force
description: Two childhood best friends reunite as an unlikely crime-fighting superhero duo when one invents a formula that gives ordinary people superpowers.

title: Who Killed Sara?
description: Hell-bent on exacting revenge and proving he was framed for his sister's murder, Álex sets out to unearth much more than the crime's real culprit.

title: Heist
description: Millions in stolen cash. Missing luxury bourbon. Watch ordinary people almost get away with these extraordinary heists in this true crime series.

title: Crime Stories: India Detectives
description: Cameras following Bengaluru police on the job offer a rare glimpse into the complex and challenging inner workings of four major crime investigations.

title: Crime Scene: The Vanishing at the Cecil Hotel
description: The notorious Cecil Hotel grows in infamy when guest Elisa Lam vanishes. From the creator of "The Ted Bundy Tapes," a dive into crime's darkest places.

title: Clickbait
description: When family man Nick Brewer is abducted in a crime with a sinister online twist, those closest to him race to uncover who is behind it and why.

title: Elize Matsunaga: Once Upon a Crime
description: The crime shocked Brazil: Elize Matsunaga shot and dismembered her rich husband. Featuring her first interview, this docuseries dives deep into the case.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: Confined to her home by agoraphobia, a psychologist becomes obsessed with her new neighbors — and solving a brutal crime she witnesses from her window.

title: Vendetta: Truth, Lies and The Mafia
description: Sicily boasts a bold "Anti-Mafia" coalition. But what happens when those trying to bring down organized crime are accused of being criminals themselves?

title: This Is a Robbery: The World's Biggest Art Heist
description: In 1990, two men dressed as cops con their way into a Boston museum and steal a fortune in art. Take a deep dive into this daring and notorious crime.

title: Gunpowder Milkshake
description: When an assassin veers off mission to rescue a child, she triggers a war with a powerful crime syndicate — and reunites a gun-wielding sisterhood.

title: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer
description: Beneath the sunlit glamour of 1985 LA lurks a relentlessly evil serial killer. In this true-crime story, two detectives won't rest until they catch him.

title: Cocaine Cowboys: The Kings of Miami
description: Two childhood friends go from high school dropouts to the most powerful drug kingpins in Miami in this true story of a crime saga that spanned decades.

title: Memories of a Murderer: The Nilsen Tapes
description: Serial killer Dennis Nilsen narrates his life and horrific crimes via a series of chilling audiotapes recorded from his jail cell.

title: Murder Among the Mormons
description: High-stakes exploits turn deadly — and shake a global church to its core — in this extraordinary true crime story.

title: Young Wallander
description: An incendiary hate crime stirs civil unrest, fast-tracking rookie cop Kurt Wallander to detective in this origin story for the popular character.

title: World's Most Wanted
description: Suspected of heinous crimes, they’ve avoided capture despite massive rewards and global investigations. A docuseries profiling the world’s most wanted.

title: Dirty John
description: Businesswoman Debra Newell's life unravels when she falls for the lies and manipulation of con man John Meehan. Based on the true-crime podcast.

title: Sanitation Day
description: Two cops must contend with the uncooperative tenants of an apartment complex as they try to solve a murder before the crime scene is wiped clean.

title: Puerta 7
description: A determined woman works to rid an Argentine soccer club of the violent crime and corruption surrounding its intense fanbase.

title: The Debt Collector 2
description: French and Sue have two days to collect on three debts, using as much force as it takes – all while evading the wrath of a crime lord out for revenge.

title: Extracurricular
description: A model high school student who's steeped in a world of serious crime finds his double life upended when a classmate takes an interest in his secret.

title: RattleSnake - The Ahanna Story
description: In this stylish remake, a disillusioned mastermind assembles a team to pull off a series of spectacular heists — but his crimes make too many enemies.

title: Children of Adam
description: Amid crime and corruption, the lives of two couples intertwine as unexpected events soon reveal their dark secrets and tainted pasts.

title: I AM A KILLER: RELEASED
description: In this crime docuseries spinoff, a convict is paroled 30 years after being sentenced to death for murder. Then he makes a stunning confession.

title: Suburra: Blood on Rome
description: In 2008, a fight over land in a seaside town near Rome spirals into a deadly battle between organized crime, corrupt politicians and the Vatican.

title: Criminal: UK
description: Within the walls of an interrogation room and with time running out, London investigators go after three suspects, each accused of a grievous crime.

title: Cut Throat City
description: Bereft of opportunities in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, a young man and his close friends turn to a life of crime in the 9th Ward of New Orleans.

title: The Shadow of Violence
description: As he reconciles with his ex and their son, an enforcer for a crime family gets an order that tests his loyalty and endangers everyone he holds dear.

title: Masameer - The Movie
description: A young girl passionate about AI sets out to make an impact as three friends become crime-fighting superheroes. Based on the hit animated web series.

title: I AM A KILLER
description: Death row inmates convicted of capital murder give a firsthand account of their crimes in this documentary series.

title: Mrs. Serial Killer
description: When a doctor gets jailed for a string of shocking murders, his loyal wife sets out to commit a copycat crime to prove his innocence.

title: Horse Girl
description: A sweet misfit with a fondness for crafts, horses and supernatural crime shows finds her increasingly lucid dreams trickling into her waking life.

title: Trial By Media
description: In this true crime docuseries, some of the most dramatic trials of all time are examined with an emphasis on how the media may have impacted verdicts.

title: All For Love
description: A penniless country boy goes in search of his runaway sister in Bogotá, where he falls for an aspiring singer, but gets tangled up in organized crime.

title: All Day and a Night
description: While serving life in prison, a young man looks back at the people, the circumstances and the system that set him on the path toward his crime.

title: How to Fix a Drug Scandal
description: Two drug lab chemists' shocking crimes cripple a state's judicial system and blur the lines of justice for lawyers, officials and thousands of inmates.

title: Dracula
description: The Count Dracula legend transforms with new tales that flesh out the vampire's gory crimes – and bring his vulnerability into the light.

title: The Defeated
description: In 1946 Berlin, an American cop searches for his missing brother while helping a novice German policewoman fight the violent crimes engulfing the city.

title: Omo Ghetto: the Saga
description: Twins are reunited as a good-hearted female gangster and her uptight rich sister take on family, crime, cops and all of the trouble that follows them.

title: One Day: Justice Delivered
description: A former judge in retirement finds and punishes the culprits he could not convict in court, spurring a crime branch officer to investigate.

title: Nimbe
description: A bullied teenager gravitates toward the acceptance he finds in a street gang but soon ends up involved in a world of drug abuse and organized crime.

title: The Silence of the Marsh
description: While researching corruption for his new book, a successful crime novelist shades the line between fiction and reality.

title: 60 Days In
description: Recruited by a sheriff, volunteers infiltrate county prisons to expose corruption and crime from within the system in this docuseries.

title: Strangers from Hell
description: Unpleasant events disturb the life of an aspiring crime fiction writer when he becomes a resident of an apartment building teeming with shady neighbors.

title: Orange Is the New Black
description: A privileged New Yorker ends up in a women's prison when a past crime catches up with her in this Emmy-winning series from the creator of "Weeds."

title: Three Thieves
description: Frustrated at work, three young men use a case of mistaken identity to pull off a seemingly simple crime – but their scheme comically unravels.

title: PJ Masks
description: Three 6-year-old kids who live normal lives during the day become superheroes at night, fighting crime as a team known as PJ Masks.
